info.name: Hotel Management API
info.description:
API documentation for the Hotel Management system

variable.description: (Required) ID of the reservation to be retrieved

request.description: Retrieve reservations by status. Only accessible by admins.

variable.description: (Required) ID of the room whose reservations are to be retrieved

request.description: Retrieve reservations by room ID. Accessible by admin and customers.

variable.description: (Required) ID of the customer whose reservations are to be retrieved

request.description: Retrieve reservations by customer ID. Accessible by admin and customers.
